about_me_paragraph_1: I mostly work on web apps, AI projects, and infrastructure. I would say I'm proficient in TS (both server and client w/ NextJS and Vue), Rust, anything LLMs/Transformers related, and everything Cloud. I'm currently building things at [Komorebi](https://kmrb.tech).
about_me_paragraph_2: As for my personal life, I'm a huge fan of video games and [sumika](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sumika). I'm currently playing [Final Fantasy XVI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Final_Fantasy_XVI) if you're interested.
contact_description: The easiest way to reach me is via [Whatsapp](https://wa.me/919744375687?text=hii) or [Discord]{COPY:notalen}. Otherwise, you can reach me via [email](mailto:alenyohannan71@gmail.com) or [schedule a meeting](/meeting).
meta_description: Engineer, developer and creator of cool stuff
